nodes.text: Bureau of Ships and Services Heritage Museum

The Bureau of Ships and Services Heritage Museum was a museum of the Bureau of Ships and Services that was located on Coruscant. During the time it was active, it had in its possession an ancient navigational dataplaque from the Permondiri Explorer which was eventually stolen and replaced with a forgery.
The Bureau of Ships and Services Heritage Museum was first mentioned in the 2018 canon reference book, Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious.
